# References 

## Method demo class 

Example class used to demonstrate the different ways methods can be mocked.

```csharp
public abstract class MethodDemoClass
{
    public abstract string Greeting(string name, int age);

    public abstract Task<int> GetAgeAsync(string name, CancellationToken token);

    public abstract bool TryGetAge(string name, out int age);

    public abstract Task SetAge(string name, int age, CancellationToken token);

    public abstract T AsType<T>(string name) where T : INumber<int>;
}
```

## Demo interface 

```csharp
public interface DemoInterface
{
    string StandardMethod(string name, int age);

    Task<int> AsyncMethod(string name, CancellationToken token);

    bool MethodWithOutParameter(string name, out int age);
    
    void MethodReturningVoid(string name, int age);

    string SimpleProperty { get; set; }
    
    string this[string name] { get; set; }
}
```

## Idemo dependency 

```csharp
internal interface IDemoDependency
{
    public string StringProperty { get; set; }
}
```

## Dependency implementation 

```csharp
internal class DependencyImplementation : IDemoDependency
{
    public string StringProperty { get; set; } = "Demo";
}
```

## Demo service 

```csharp
internal class DemoService(TimeProvider timeProvider, HttpClient httpClient, IOptions<DemoServiceConfig> options, IDemoDependency demoDependency, ILogger<DemoService> logger)
{
    public string GetStringProperty() => demoDependency.StringProperty;
}
```

## Demo service config 

```csharp
public class DemoServiceConfig
{
    public string DemoStringValue { get; set; } = "Demo";
}
```

```csharp
internal class UnknownPersonException(string name) : Exception($"Unknown person {name}")

}
```
